house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1998 has 5 bedroom(s), 6 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 4 car detached garage and approximately 7709 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, fireplace, french doors, satellite dish.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Dishwasher, Elevator, Fenced, Foyer, French Doors, GarageDoor Opener, Kitchen Island, Outdoor Grill, Satellite Dish, TrashCompacter
